pageTitle: You may be eligible for New Style ESA
h1: Based on your answers, you may be eligible for New Style ESA
inset:
You will not be able to save your answers and come back to the form later. But you’ll get a chance to check and update your answers before you send them.

There is no time limit for filling in the application. But if you stay on the same page for 60 minutes, it will time out and you’ll have to start again.
p1: We will treat your personal information carefully. We may use it for any of our purposes. To learn about your information rights and how we use information, see our personal information charter (opens in new tab).
